Class TrialHelper

java.lang.Object

public class TrialHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Contains the tools for running trials.

findOneCell

public static Cell1 findOneCell(Density density,
                                Parameters1 p1,
                                VectorDouble start,
                                VectorDouble end,
                                java.lang.String name)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Searches for a single 1-cell. If the 1-cell did not converge, then its points are null.

Parameters:
density - density estimator
p1 - trial parameters
start - first endpoint
end - second endpoint
name - name of the trial
Returns:

clusterZeroCells

public Cell0[] clusterZeroCells(Cell0[] vertices,
                                double clusteringThreshold)
Clusters 0-cells, using single-linkage clustering. Returns the densest 0-cell from each cluster.

Parameters:
vertices - 0-cells to cluster
clusteringThreshold - clustering threshold
